name: Reversal
description:
Reversal is a simple juggling style game.

Your goal is to keep the shapes on the screen for the goal time and beyond by reversing their direction. As the speed increases Reversal becomes a game of quick thinking, fast reaction and careful planning.

After a web build? visit gamejolt.com where you can play demo version online free.

Music: grapes facebook.com/grapes510

Sound Effects: Noise For Fun

The game is currently in development so more features and more levels are in the works.

***** New Paid Version *****

New changes:

  • 30 levels
  • 3 level sets, each with new mechanic introduced
  • New sound effects
  • Overall tweaks to gameplay
  • Tweaks and additions to UI

To stay updated on progress or to provide feedback/bug reports:
